name: Life Plug
description:
Steal others' life to keep yours!

'Life Plug' was made in two days for the Ludum Dare Game Jam #46, with the theme "Keep it alive". All code, images and music theme were made during that time.

How to play:
  • Click the screen to move to that point. You will only be able to do it if you have enough life.
  • Click a person to plug in your plug and get life from them (red button) or give them some of yours (blue button).
  • Release the mouse button to stop getting or giving life to a person.
  • The goal is to reach the big white heart in each stage.
Stage 1 Guide

DON'T READ THIS IF YOU WANT TO COMPLETE THE LEVEL BY YOURSELF

  • First, you need to reach the person that is standing to the right. Take all their life.
  • Then, continue to the right until you reach another person. Take all their life. 
  • Next to that person there is a lift, that another person will use continuously as he's carrying boxes to the top floor. Don't take their life.
  • Next to the boxes, there are two people standing. Take the first one's life and wait for the lift person to come. Then, give all your life to the lift person.
  • Once the person goes back to the lift, take all the life from the second person and return to the previous room, where you'll find a way to go to the next floor.
  • Cross that floor and in the second floor there's a person standing. Take all their life so you can continue.
  • Reach the top floor and wait for the person in the elevator to come. Once he arrives, take all his life (it's the life you gave to him earlier).
  • Now go to the right to reach the end of the level.
